plot: In the land of Equestria, Princess Celestia's apprentice Twilight Sparkle is sent to Ponyville to learn about the importance of friendship.
title: My Little Pony, La Magia de la Amistad
plot_es: In the land of Equestria, Princess Celestia's apprentice Twilight Sparkle is sent to Ponyville to learn about the importance of friendship.
original_name: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic
plot_en: In the land of Equestria, Princess Celestia's apprentice Twilight Sparkle is sent to Ponyville to learn about the importance of friendship.
